body: At 8th level, when you use your augury spell-like ability, you gain a benefit that lasts until the end of your next combat. If the result was “weal,” all curing effects used on you cure an additional +1d10 hit points. If the result was “woe,” your melee attacks deal an additional +1d6 points of damage. If the result is “weal and woe” or “nothing,” you gain a +2 insight bonus to your Armor Class.
name: Agent of Fate
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Inquisitor/Inquisitions/Fate Inquisition/Granted Powers/Agent of Fate
